itemDescription: British pornographic film director and Baron

wikipedia_page.main: Jasper Orlando Slingsby Duncombe, 7th Baron Feversham, (born 14 March 1968), also known as The Porn Baron, is a British nobleman and producer of pornographic films.

link_mentions.page: List of barons in the peerages of Britain and Ireland

response: * Jasper Duncombe, 7th Baron Feversham (born 1968), British adult film director
* Jasper Duncombe, 7th Baron Feversham (born 1968), British adult film producer

The building was used as a girls' school between 1914 and 1980. The Rievaulx Terrace and Temples were acquired by the National Trust in 1972. After 1985 the house was restored as a family home by the 6th Baron Feversham, but on his death in 2009 it was left not to his heir Jasper Duncombe, 7th Baron Feversham, but to a younger son Jake Duncombe. It is a Grade I listed building.
